name: AFitLifeWithMelZ
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hi, I'm Mel. 

I started my health and fitness journey 3 years ago. I was a stay at home mom, overweight, battling depression and totally lost. I didn't know where to turn, how to start, or what to do; but I finally woke up one morning and just started running. The running led to better eating habits, which led to a gym routine and more small steps along the way. I've had my ups and downs, but I am confident in my journey now, and ready to share some of my tips and struggles with you. Hopefully this will encourage you to join me in living a happier, healthier and more rewarding life by making small but consistent lifestyle changes. Let's have fun and stay healthy together!

 

[ The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. ]
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
